carapace.text: Grants immunity to Poison, Slowness, Mining Fatigue and Fire

cat_in_a_jar.text: Grants a dodge chance for incoming projectiles and removes block damage from explosions

centipede_feet.text: Allows wall climbing and grants you immunity to Kinetic Damage

elven_socks.text: Removes any and all fall damage

ender_anchor.text: Makes items automatically teleport to you when in range of your Magnet

gluttony_pendant.text: Grants instant eating, and potion consuming speed

golden_burger.text: Doubles the Vault Experience gained inside a vault

high_heels.text: Grants the ability to walk up full blocks

night_vision_goggles.text: Grants vision of chests and coin piles, with their associated color, in a nearby area around you

wendarrs_hourglass.text: Adds 2 minutes and 30 seconds to the Vault Timer
